bibl.title: Recipes for Female Complaints and Other Ailments: P. CtYBR inv. 1443, col. I.
bibl.note: P. Yale (P. CtYBR) Inv. 1443, purchased by Michael Rostovzeff in 1931, from Maurice Nahmum [sic, read: Nahman] in Paris. Tebtunis (?), I exit. - II init.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: HANSON Ann Ellis, Recipes for Female Complaints and Other Ailments: P. CtYBR inv. 1443, col. I.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 427-433 et pl. coul. XVII.
P. Yale (P. CtYBR) Inv. 1443, purchased by Michael Rostovzeff in 1931, from Maurice Nahmum [sic, read: Nahman] in Paris. Tebtunis (?), I exit. - II init.
